channel.title: Admins cant trade -.-
channel.description: Hello :) I'm using marcscape v3 and my admins are tired of not being able to trade and drop... how can i disable this... I want them to be able to drop and trade, they cannot spawn so there really isnt any risks... Thanks guys!

item.title: Admins cant trade -.-
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

This is simple, just look for the message you get if you get one, or, just search for the condition in the right class, most probably the client class.

if(playerRights == 2)

Or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins cant trade -.-
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Hello
I’m using marcscape v3 and my admins are tired of not being able to trade and drop… how can i disable this…
I want them to be able to drop and trade, they cannot spawn so there really isnt any risks…
Thanks guys!
